name: garage-sale-organizer
description: A comprehensive garage sale organizer with AI-powered listing creation

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend:dev" "npm run frontend:dev" "npm run public:dev"
scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build && npm run public:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../public-site && npm install

author: Wes
